Tazavesh: Streets of Wonder Guide

11.2 - Ghosts of K'aresh

Last Updated:August 5, 2025|Changelog

Welcome to the Tazavesh: Streets of Wonder Guide Mythic+ guide for the World of Warcraft patch 11.2! This guide covers everything you need to know about your upcoming dungeon runs!

Route

Patch 11.2 - Ghosts of K'aresh
Tazavesh: Streets of Wonder

It is recommended to use the Mythic Dungeon Tools addon to look at your route and mob count before the Mythic+ dungeon starts. Below you can see an example of a Weekly Route meant for +10 keys or lower.

Simply import the route into the Mythic Dungeon Tool addon and take a look at it with your group.

Weekly Route

Utility Needs

Patch 11.2 - Ghosts of K'aresh
Tazavesh: Streets of Wonder
Bleed
Magic Dispel
Magic Purge
Curse
  • Chains of Damnation
    • A Bleed debuff that inflicts physical damage over time and decreases movement speed by 100%.
  • Frantic Rip
    • A Bleed debuff that inflicts physical damage over time.
  • Letter Opener
    • A Bleed debuff that inflicts physical damage over time.
  • Phase Slash
    • A Bleed debuff during the So'azmi encounter that inflicts physical damage over time.
  • Quickblade
    • A Bleed debuff that inflicts physical damage over time.
  • Common utility examples:
    • Evoker
      • Cauterizing Flame
    • Paladin
      • Blessing of Protection
  • Alchemical Residue
    • A stacking Magic debuff during the Mailroom Mayhem encounter that inflicts arcane damage over time.
  • Empowered Glyph of Restraint
    • A Magic debuff that reduces movement speed and inflicts arcane damage over time.
      • Interruptible.
  • Glyph of Restraint
    • A Magic debuff reducing movement speed and inflicting arcane damage over time.
      • Interruptible.
  • Hyperlight Bomb
    • A Magic debuff that explodes after 5 seconds, inflicting arcane damage to all players within 5 yards.
  • Purification Protocol
    • A Magic debuff during the The Grand Menagerie encounter that inflicts holy damage over time.
  • Lockdown
    • A Magic debuff rooting and inflicting arcane damage over time.
  • Common utility examples:
    • Priest
      • Mass Dispel
    • Warlock
      • Singe Magic
  • Hard Light Barrier
    • A Magic buff absorbing incoming damage.
      • Interruptible.
  • Hard Light Baton
    • A Magic buff enhancing Customs Security's weapon, inflicting additional arcane damage with each melee attack.
  • Refraction Shield
    • A Magic buff that inflicts arcane damage to the caster of harmful spells.
  • Spam Filter
    • A Magic buff that reduces damage taken.
  • Common utility examples:
    • Warlock
      • Devour Magic
    • Hunter
      • Tranquilizing Shot
    • Priest
      • Dispel Magic         and
        Mass Dispel
    • Shaman
      • Purge
    • Mage
      • Spellsteal
    • Demon Hunter
      • Consume Magic
  • Ancient Dread
    • A Curse debuff that reduces the cast and attack speed of the afflicted player.
  • Common utility examples:
    • Druid
      • Remove Corruption
      • Nature's Cure         for
        Restoration
    • Mage
      • Remove Curse
    • Shaman
      • Cleanse Spirit
      • Purify Spirit         with
        Improved Purify Spirit         for
        Restoration
    • Evoker
      • Cauterizing Flame

Zo'Phex the Sentinel Trash Area

Patch 11.2 - Ghosts of K'aresh
Tazavesh: Streets of Wonder
Customs Security
Support Officer
Portalmancer Zo'honn
Interrogation Specialist
Gatewarden Zo'mazz
Armored Overseer
  • Required Magic Purge:
    • Hard Light Baton
      • The caster enhances their weapon, inflicting an additional arcane damage with each melee attack.
  • Disruption Grenade
    • Hurls a grenade at a location, upon detonation it inflicts arcane damage to players within 4 yards and knocks them back.
  • Teleport
    • Teleports to a location
  • Required Kick:
    • Hyperlight Bolt
      • Inflicts arcane damage to the target.
    • Hard Light Barrier
      • Forms an absorb shield around an ally.
        • Absorb shield is a Magic buff and can be purged.
  • Required Kick:
    • Empowered Glyph of Restraint
      • Reduces the movement speed of the target by 40% and inflicts arcane damage every 2 seconds for 16 seconds.
  • Radiant Pulse
    • Inflicts arcane damage instantly and every second for 3 seconds to all players.
  • Rift Blasts
    • Unleashes rift blasts from nearby broker portals, inflicting arcane damage.
  • Required Kick:
    • Glyph of Restraint
      • Reduces the movement speed of the target and inflicts arcane damage every 2 seconds for 16 seconds.
  • Proxy Strike
    • Summons a replica weapon that then strikes an enemy, inflicting arcane damage.
  • Radiant Pulse
    • Inflicts arcane damage instantly and an additional arcane damage every second for 3 seconds to all players.
  • Proxy Strike
    • Summons a replica weapon that then strikes an enemy, inflicting arcane damage.
  • Beam Splicer
    • Deploys a rotating trap, inflicting arcane damage every 2 seconds for 6 seconds to players that pass through it.

Zo'Phex the Sentinel

Patch 11.2 - Ghosts of K'aresh
Tazavesh: Streets of Wonder
Overview
Interrogation
Armed Security
Fully Armed
Impound Contraband
Charged Slash
  • Keep an eye on the
    Impound Contraband     timer and make sure you are full health when it comes. Additionally, try not to grief your major DPS cooldowns by getting silenced when it comes, delay them if needed.
  • Move away from the boss if you are targeted by an
    Interrogation     cast before it ends.
    • Depending on your group dps you will need to move away further or closer. If you are unsure run away at least 30 yards from the boss.
    • If you are not targeted by it, don't stand in front of the boss and between the
      Interrogated       player as you are going to get killed by the frontal cleave.
  • Don't stand in front of the boss to not get hit by
    Charged Slash     frontal.
  • Zo'Phex fixates a marked player for
    Interrogation    , detaining them within a
    Containment Cell     while slowly advancing towards them.
    • While advancing, Zo'Phex blades inflict deadly arcane damage directly in front of the caster.
  • Destroying a
    Containment Cell     ends the
    Interrogation     and triggers a
    Security Measure     inflicting arcane damage to all players.
  • Zo'Phex's arms detach from his torso and begin to whirl violently, inflicting physical damage every 1.5 seconds to nearby players within 6 yards.
  • Zo'Phex replenishes the limbs of his torso, increasing physical damage done by 25%.
  • Zo'Phex confiscates a player's weapon, silencing and pacifying them until they retrieve it.
    • Retrieving your weapon emboldens you, increasing Haste by 25% for 12 seconds.
  • Zo'Phex charges up his swords and unleashes a massive slash, inflicting physical damage to all players in front of him.

The Grand Menagerie Trash Area

Patch 11.2 - Ghosts of K'aresh
Tazavesh: Streets of Wonder
Frenzied Nightclaw
Ancient Core Hound
Tracker Zo'korss
Enraged Direhorn
  • Frantic Rip
    • Leaps at a target, inflicting physical damage on application and every second for 5 seconds.
  • Required Kick:
    • Ancient Dread
      • Reduces an enemy's casting speed by 50% and the time between its attacks by 100% for 30 seconds.
        • Debuff is a Curse and can be dispelled.
  • Lava Breath
    • Inflicts fire damage to enemies in front of the caster.
  • Required Magic Dispel:
    • Lockdown
      • Bind players with magical energy, rooting them and inflicting arcane damage every second for 8 seconds.
  • Beam Splicer
    • Deploys a rotating trap, inflicting arcane damage every 2 seconds for 6 seconds to players that pass through it.
  • Chain of Custody
    • Binds all players, forcing them to stay within 10 yards of the caster.
  • Frenzied Charge
    • Charges towards a random player, inflicting physical damage to all players caught in the path and stunning them for 2 seconds.
  • Wild Thrash
    • Thrashes wildly inflicting physical damage to all players within 8 yards.

The Grand Menagerie

Patch 11.2 - Ghosts of K'aresh
Tazavesh: Streets of Wonder
Overview
Gluttony
Grip of Hunger
Grand Consumption
Venting Protocol
Flagellation Protocol
Purification Protocol
Whirling Annihilation
Chains of Damnation
  • While fighting Alcruux, whenever
    Grand Consumption     happens, don't panic and remember that although orbs cover the whole room, they come in two waves. Stand in the second wave of orbs and wait until the first one falls, and then step into the safe zone to dodge the second wave.
  • When Achillite enters the fight and you have finished Alcruux, move the Achillite to one of the corners of the room to have an easier time dealing with orbs when it dies.
    • Soak the small orbs flying around whenever you are afflicted with a
      Gluttony      .
  • Once Venza Goldfuse joins the fight, finish the Achillite and move out to the center of the room.
    • Protect whoever is rooted by
      Chains of Damnation       from small orbs with a
      Gluttony       debuff and kill the chains as soon as possible.
    • Try to be grouped up and sort of close to the player with
      Gluttony       to have an easier time dodging the small orbs.
  • Alcruux afflicts the nearest player with the essence of hunger for 21 seconds, allowing them to safely absorb volatile anima but inflicting shadow damage every second to all other players within 5 yards.
    • Upon expiration,
      Gluttony       is transferred to the nearest other player.
      • Devoured Anima         increases all damage done by 5% for each absorbed volatile anima.
  • Alcruux pulls all players to his location, then strikes with explosive force inflicting shadow damage to all players within 20 yards.
  • Alcruux creates waves of consuming orbs that explode after 4 seconds, leeching health from all players within 12 yards.
  • Achillite vents its anima core, releasing volatile anima and inflicting holy damage and knocking back all players within 7 yards.
    • Volatile anima explodes on contact with a player, inflicting holy damage to players within 4 yards and decreasing their damage done by 5% for 1 minute. This effect stacks.
  • Achillite begins pummeling its target, inflicting physical damage every 0.5 seconds for 5 seconds.
  • Achillite afflicts 2 players with unstable anima, inflicting holy damage every second for 6 seconds. Explodes upon expiration, inflicting holy damage to all players within 10 yards.
  • Venza whirls madly with the edge of annihilation, drawing all players towards her and inflicting physical damage every second to all players within 7 yards.
  • Venza chains a random player in place, inflicting physical damage every 2 seconds and decreasing their speed by 100% until the chains are destroyed

Myza's Oasis Trash Area

Patch 11.2 - Ghosts of K'aresh
Tazavesh: Streets of Wonder
Cartel Muscle
Market Peacekeeper
Cartel Skulker
Cartel Smuggler
Bazaar Overseer
Cartel Wiseguy
Bazaar Strongarm
Cartel Lackey
  • Hyperlight Backhand
    • Inflicts arcane damage to the target and knocks it back.
  • Chronolight Enhancer
    • Reduces the movement speed of the target by 65% for 8 seconds and causes it to inflict 100% reduced damage for 8 seconds.
  • Quelling Strike
    • Charges a random player, strikes them and inflicts physical damage.
  • Phalanx Field
    • Enters a defensive stance, redirecting spells towards the caster. In addition, reduces magic damage taken by 75% for 8 seconds.
  • Required Bleed Dispel:
    • Quickblade
      • Dashes through a player, inflicting physical damage to players along the way, and causing them to bleed.
  • Stealth
    • Starts in stealth mode until approached.
  • Required Magic Dispel:
    • Hyperlight Bomb
      • Applies a Magic debuff that explodes after 5 seconds, inflicting arcane damage to all players within 5 yards.
  • Pierce
    • Pierces the target's armor, inflicting physical damage and increasing their physical damage taken by 20% for 15 seconds.
  • Energized Slam
    • Slams the ground, unleashing energy towards the targeted enemy. The energy erupts and inflicts arcane damage to all enemies within 6 yards of impact.
  • Required Kick:
    • Hyperlight Bolt
      • Inflicts arcane damage to the target.
  • Lightshard Retreat
    • The caster teleports away leaving a glyph that explodes, inflicting arcane damage and disorienting all players within 8 yards of the impact.
  • Required Magic Dispel:
    • Static Mace
      • The caster's successful melee attacks inflict arcane damage and slow the target by 10% for 20 seconds. This effect stacks.
        • Slow is a Magic debuff and can be dispelled.
  • Gang Up
    • The Cartel Lackeys boaster each other's confidence, increasing their damage done and haste for each other Cartel Lackeys in combat.

Myza's Oasis

Patch 11.2 - Ghosts of K'aresh
Tazavesh: Streets of Wonder
Overview
Final Warning
Suppression Spark
Crowd Control
Security Slam
Menacing Shout
  • At the start of the fight each of you in the group will have to pick up an instrument. This will grant you an extra action button that will either charge you forward or knock up, depending on what you picked. You will later use this button to acquire the
    Jazzy     and
    Up Tempo!     buffs by pressing an extra action button and cleaving symbols on the floor.
  • During the first phase, you will be fighting multiple trash mob waves until Zo'gron comes down.
    • Be careful to not get aggro when they spawn and let the tank pick them up first before doing damage to them.
    • Always interrupt
      Menacing Shout       casted by Oasis Security and try to stop as many
      Hyperlight Bolts       as you can from Disruptive Patrons.
  • During the second phase, when Zo'gron joins the fight, spread around him but don't be too far so you can still dodge the
    Crowd Control     frontal. Make sure to have offensive cooldowns ready whenever it's time for a
    Final Warning     absorb shield.
  • Zo'Gron protects himself with a force field, absorbing incoming damage, and starts casting
    Final Warning    . When the cast finishes, inflicts arcane damage to all players.
  • Zo'Gron pulls players towards his location, creating an opportune moment for a group performance.
    • After 6 seconds each players inflicts arcane damage to allies within 4 yards.
  • Zo'Gron deflects all attacks and spells from the front for 5 seconds.
    • When the guard ends, Zo'gron inflicts arcane damage to all players in a frontal cone and knocks them back.
  • Zo'Gron clobbers their target with a hammer, inflicting physical damage.
  • Inflicts physical damage to all players and interrupts spellcasting for 6 seconds. Ignores armor.
    • Interruptible.

Mailroom Mayhem Trash Area

Patch 11.2 - Ghosts of K'aresh
Tazavesh: Streets of Wonder
P.O.S.T. Worker
Defective Sorter
Overloaded Mailemental
  • Letter Opener
    • Inflicts physical damage and causes the target to bleed.
  • Mail Shoot
    • Launch a package toward a player, inflicting physical damage to players within 3 yards on impact.
  • Required Kick:
    • Spam Filter
      • Applies a magical filter to an ally, reducing damage taken by 50% for 15 seconds. This is a Magic buff and can be purged.
  • Junk Mail
    • Throws unwanted mail at a player, inflicting physical damage.

Mailroom Mayhem

Patch 11.2 - Ghosts of K'aresh
Tazavesh: Streets of Wonder
Overview
Unstable Goods
Hazardous Liquids
Fan Mail
Money Order
  • Generally, throughout the fight, try to be stacked to have an easier time healing through
    Fan Mail     and
    Money Order     soaks.
  • Soak
    Hazardous Liquids     whenever it happens.
  • Spread around the room when it's time for
    Unstable Goods    . Don't afk on the boss and help your team with throwing packages to the active delivery portal.
  • The P.O.S.T. Master activates the central mail portal, releasing packages of
    Unstable Goods     that explode if not delivered within 30 seconds.
    • Players can pick up
      Unstable Goods      , reducing movement speed by 20% and granting the throw package ability. The package must land in an active delivery portal or be caught by another player.
  • Unstable Goods     explode if dropped, or if they're not delivered within 30 seconds, inflicting fire damage to all players.
  • The P.O.S.T. Master activates the central mail portal, releasing a shipment of hazardous liquids that spill on the floor unless caught by players.
  • Players who catch hazardous liquids are covered in residue, inflicting arcane damage every second for 10 seconds. This effect stacks.
    • This is a Magic debuff and can be dispelled.
  • Spilled liquids inflict arcane damage every second and reduce movement speed by 35% for players standing within them.
  • The P.O.S.T. Master goes haywire, firing letters in every direction that inflict physical damage every second to all players for 5 seconds.
  • The P.O.S.T. Master drops a ton of gold on a player, inflicting physical damage to players within 6 yards, split evenly between all players hit.

So'azmi Trash Area

Patch 11.2 - Ghosts of K'aresh
Tazavesh: Streets of Wonder
Commander Zo'far
  • Shock Mines
    • Scatters mines that detonate on contact, inflicting arcane damage to players within 3 yards and stunning them for 3 seconds.
  • Power Kick
    • Inflicts physical damage to the target and knocks it back.
  • Lethal Force
    • Links two players together, continuously pushing them towards each other for 8 seconds. Touching another linked player inflicts arcane damage every second for 5 seconds.

So'azmi

Patch 11.2 - Ghosts of K'aresh
Tazavesh: Streets of Wonder
Overview
Shuri
Deploy Relocators
Divide
Double Technique
Phase Slash
  • Always be close to the boss and follow the tank.
  • Step into connected relics to dodge the
    Shuri     mechanic.
    • Relics of the same shape are connected to each other and will teleport you once stepped on.
  • Keep in mind that you need to interrupt
    Double Technique     twice to end the cast.
  • So'azmi creates an expanding ring of arcane energy that causes players caught in its path to suffer arcane damage every second for 10 seconds.
  • So'azmi deploys pairs of relocators to confuse his enemies.
    • When a player touches a relocator, they are instantly teleported to the other relocator that matches it.
  • Upon reaching 70% and 40% health, So'azmi divides the area with a barrier that players are unable to move or target through.
  • So'azmi uses his secret two-part technique. Upon completion he hurls burning blades at all players, inflicting fire damage every second for 10 seconds.
    • This spell must be interrupted 2 times to prevent it from being cast.
  • So'azmi steps into the shadow and slashes 3 random players, inflicting physical damage and causing them to bleed.

Tazavesh: Streets of Wonder

Weapons
